content.description: The images show the sika dwa kofi (Golden Stool) and the Nkisi nâ€™kondi.
content.question: Both works were created with materials selected because they are

choices.label: associated with rituals that ensure fertility and prosperity
instilled with unique properties that channel authority
connected with funerary ceremonies and ancestor worship
linked with initiation rites in annual communal gatherings

content.answer: instilled with unique properties that channel authority

topic.text: 6.2: Purpose and Audience in African Art

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain how two or more works of art are similar and/or different in how they convey meaning.
